alert.note: Alert for Escambia Coastal (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 5:22PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Baldwin and south central Escambia Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 421 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Lillian, or 10 miles southwest of Gonzalez. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lillian and Myrtle Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
